descriptionNullable:
# Dataset Description: Simpsons Character Classification

## Overview

The Simpsons Character Classification dataset is designed for the task of image-based character recognition from the popular TV show "The Simpsons." This dataset includes images of 11 key characters from the series, providing a diverse set of visual representations for each character in various scenes and settings.


## Dataset Content
The dataset comprises a total of 28,878 images, categorized into 11 classes. Each class corresponds to a different character from the show. The distribution of images is split into training, validation, and testing subsets.

## Classes
The dataset includes the following classes:

1. homer_simpson
2. krusty_the_clown
3. milhouse_van_houten
4. moe_szyslak
5. marge_simpson
6. charles_montgomery_burns
7. principal_skinner
8. lisa_simpson
9. bart_simpson
10. maggie_simpson
11. ned_flanders


## Data Split
Training Set: 11,157 images
Validation Set: 2,782 images
Testing Set: 13,939 images

##Code exemple:
https://www.kaggle.com/code/rodrigov/simpsons-character-classification
title: Simpsons Characters
